item.title: Februrary Report
item.description: February Team Meetings Recap: Progress and Milestones # February has been a month of significant strides for our team, with four productive meetings marking our journey towards our goals.

item.title: Ben - Finance Manager
item.description: Ben aspires to one day be a finance and business major in college.

item.title: WAAW - Computer Architecture
item.description: Welcome to the third and final unit of our 12-week online course, in collaboration with the Waaw Foundation!

item.title: March Report
item.description: March Team Meetings Recap: Advancing Our Goals # March has been a productive month filled with significant progress in our workshops, sponsorship outreach, and team building efforts.

item.title: AJ - Branding
item.description: AJ has a very strong passion for building, whether it’s cars, Legos, or robots.

item.title: Natalie - Outreach Coordinator
item.description: Natalie is a bubbly, compassionate person with a strong thirst for knowledge.

item.title: WAAW - AI
item.description: Welcome to the second unit of our 12-week online course, presented in partnership with the Waaw Foundation!

item.title: April Report
item.description: April Team Meetings Recap: Progress and New Initiatives # April has been a dynamic month for our team, characterized by a mix of technical learning, application preparation, and continued development of our online courses.

item.title: WAAW - Python
item.description: Welcome to the first unit of our 12-week online course, hosted in collaboration with the Waaw Foundation!

item.title: May Report
item.description: May Team Meetings Recap: Hardware, Courses, and New Beginnings # May has been a month of hardware planning, technical practice, and further development of our WAAW course.

item.title: Alva - Publicist
item.description: Alva loves trying and learning new things whenever she can.

item.title: Alex - Software Engineer
item.description: Alex has a passion for mathematics and history.

item.title: Annika - Software Engineer
item.description: Annika has a passion for technology and all sciences, especially astronomy.

item.title: Anushree - Software Engineer
item.description: In her free time, Anushree finds pleasure while playing tennis, painting, and drawing.

item.title: Danielle - Hardware Engineer
item.description: Danielle has a passion for architecture and building, as well as anything and everything art-related.

item.title: Niharika - Hardware Engineer
item.description: Outside of Argo, Niharika likes playing a multitude of sports and enjoys traveling and learning how to cook and bake new foods.

item.title: Sean - Hardware Engineer
item.description: Sean is an outgoing and fun person who is always trying to help others, and loves making people smile.

item.title: Sharvil - Software Lead
item.description: Sharvil is an avid programmer and aspiring engineer.

item.title: Jeeva - Hardware Lead
item.description: Jeeva is passionate about coding, robotics, and all things engineering.

item.title: Preston - Team Manager
item.description: Preston enjoys playing soccer and violin in his free time, and loves spending time with his family and friends.

item.title: Three Little Piggies
item.description: Introduction # We are thrilled to share the success of our very first workshop, “An Engineering Challenge: The Three Little Piggies,” held at Santa Clara’s Central Park Library.
